references.paper_title: Deep Residual Learning for Image Recognition
references.reason: This paper introduces the ResNet architecture, a crucial foundation for many modern deep learning models, including those used in this paper's experiments.

references.paper_title: A Baseline for Detecting Misclassified and Out-of-Distribution Examples in Neural Networks
references.reason: This foundational paper establishes a baseline approach for OOD detection, providing a benchmark against which this paper's proposed method is compared.

references.paper_title: Enhancing the Reliability of Out-of-Distribution Image Detection in Neural Networks
references.reason: This paper significantly advances OOD detection by introducing a novel method to improve the reliability and accuracy of identifying out-of-distribution data.
This paper introduces the energy-based approach to OOD detection, which this paper builds upon and improves through the proposed DRL framework.
This seminal paper provides a theoretical foundation for the Expectation-Maximization algorithm, which is the core of the proposed DRL framework.
